name: HeroCentered
description: Full-screen centered hero section with avatar group above title, centered text content, configurable background, and optional buttons.

description.example: Create stunning, responsive websites with our comprehensive component library

avatars.note: Avatars are displayed above the title for social proof

buttonRules.note: Button variant is controlled by ThemeProvider's defaultButtonVariant.

structure.items: MarqueeItem[] - Array of items with text, optional icon/image
structure.showCard: boolean - Whether to show card styling (default: true)

marqueeRules.note: Optional logo marquee positioned at bottom of hero

propsSchema.title: string
propsSchema.avatars: Avatar[] (required) - Array with src and alt

usageExample:
<ThemeProvider defaultButtonVariant="icon-arrow" borderRadius="rounded">
  <HeroCentered
    title="Build Modern Web Experiences"
    description="Create stunning, responsive websites with our component library."
    background={{ variant: 'plain' }}
    avatars={[
      { src: '/avatar1.jpg', alt: 'User 1' },
      { src: '/avatar2.jpg', alt: 'User 2' },
      { src: '/avatar3.jpg', alt: 'User 3' }
    ]}
    avatarText="Trusted by 1000+ users"
    buttons={[{ text: 'Get Started', href: '#' }]}
  />
</ThemeProvider>
do: Use for impactful landing pages with social proof emphasis
Full viewport height - purely text-focused hero
dont: Do not use for heroes with media content below
